text: Julio Antonio Miranda (October 17, 1946 – June 6, 2021) was an Argentine politician. He was a member of the Justicialist Party. Miranda was a member of the Senate from 1992 until 1999 and again from 2003 until 2009. Miranda was also Governor of the Tucumán Province from 1999 until 2003. Miranda died on June 6, 2021 from pneumonia in San Miguel de Tucumán, Argentina at the age of 74.Falleció el ex gobernador de Tucumán Julio Miranda ==References== ==Other websites== *Senate profile Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Argentine politicians Category:People from Tucumán Province
title: Julio Miranda
